Lyric:
[by:工作婊]
[00:01.22]Wish that you could build a time machine
[00:05.28]So you could see
[00:07.36]The things no one can see
[00:09.85]Feels like you're standing on the edge
[00:14.20]Looking at the stars
[00:16.11]And wishing you were them
[00:17.68]
[00:18.60]What do you do when a chapter ends
[00:22.32]Do you close the book and never read it again
[00:27.34]Where do you go when your story's done
[00:31.10]You can be who you were or who you'll become
[00:36.47]Oh-oh-oh, oh-oh-oh oh, if it all goes wrong
[00:45.29]Oh-oh-oh, oh-oh-oh oh, darling just hold on
[00:50.94]
[00:53.39]The sun goes down and it comes back up
[00:57.56]The world it turns no matter what
[01:02.74]Oh-oh-oh, oh-oh-oh oh, if it all goes wrong
[01:10.34]Darling, just hold on
[01:27.88]Darling, just hold on
[01:29.74]
[01:45.87]It's not over 'til it's all been said
[01:50.17]?It's not over 'til your dying breath
[01:54.26]?So what do you want them to say when you're gone
[01:58.63]?That you gave up or that you kept going on
[02:03.30]What do you do when a chapter ends
[02:03.60]
[02:07.80]Do you close the book and never read it again
[02:12.00]Where do you go when your story's done
[02:15.81]You can be who you were or who you'll become
[02:21.16]Oh-oh-oh, oh-oh-oh oh, if it all goes wrong
[02:30.10]Oh-oh-oh, oh-oh-oh oh, darling just hold on
[02:35.64]
[02:38.17]The sun goes down and it comes back up
[02:42.25]The world it turns no matter what
[02:47.43]Oh-oh-oh, oh-oh-oh oh, if it all goes wrong
[02:55.30]Darling, just hold on
[03:12.52]Darling, just hold on
[03:29.98]Darling, just hold on
